name: Kniffel 2 – Jetzt wird abgekniffelt!
description:
You're a die-hard fan of Yahtzee? So are we!

But there has always been the feeling that Yahtzee is also somewhat lackluster, that there could be MORE.
more dice!
more graphics!
more voice lines!
more sound-effects!
more juice!
more deer belling!

Get ready for Kniffel 2 (that's Yahtzee in German for you) - it has everything you ever wished for in the original Yathzee and more.

HUGE thanks to Studio Traumkosmos for recording all the crazy voice lines we requested and for putting your own spin to it ❤

Early Access Game
Get instant access and start playing; get involved with this game as it develops.
Note: This Early Access game is not complete and may or may not change further. If you are not excited to play this game in its current state, we really don't know how to help you tbh.

Kickstarter page for Kniffel 3 –Es hat sich ausgekniffelt! coming soon.

This game was developed for GMTK jam 2022 // IFgameSH Summer jam 2022

CREDITS:
Programming in the first 40 hours: Ines
Art direction in the first 40 hours: Jannik
Programming savior: Jannik
Art savior: Ines
Game Design: Ines & Jannik
Sounds & Voices: Studio Traumkosmos
